data.title: Abdallah Anasweh on LinkedIn: #supplychainmanagement #sustainability #ccc #mena #cascade
data.meta_description:
it was my pleasure to represent CCC in MENA Supply chain management discussion Forum.
#supplychainmanagement  #sustainability  #ccc #MENA #CASCADE 2019
data.text: Look at the full half of the cup COVID 19 pandemic was a new experience for most of us, for my generation to be forced to stay at home canceling most of the usual activities was strange and I noticed there was a lot of free time in our day. However, the big thanks to all the professionals who shared with us their experiences and practical experiences, during the pandemic period, I participated in more than 20 virtual lectures from all over the world and got acquainted with contemporary international thought. I specifically mention the following topics: 1- Utilizing Climate Scenario Analyses – GBES 2- Aligning and integration the SDG into business strategy-Samir Thabet 3- SDG Alignment for Foundations 4- Alternative Energy Innovations – NIDDAL ELKHOURY 5- WELL vs Fitwel: Healthy Building Movement – Green Building Education Services (GBES) 6- MASTERCLASS Robotic process automation (RPA) – ziggurat 7- GBES presents "LEED 2020 for Contractors – GBES 8- Places matter for stress and immunity-International WELL Building Institute (IWBI) 9- How to Net Positive Webinar –Ibrahim alzoubi 10- The Investor Perspective: Challenges, Opportunities, and Risks in the Post-COVID World for MSMEs 11- Career Inspiration Talk with Samer Khoury – #ccc #well #leed #covid19
